title: CARMA schema
description: Data schema for Coastal Aquifer Research and Management Analytics (CARMA) Platform

id.description: The ID of the HUC-12, e.g.: 111402010000

description.description: A description for the HUC-12 watershed

area.description: The total area of the HUC-12 watershed (unit: ha)

cropArea.description: The crop area of the HUC-12 watershed (unit: ha)

developedArea.description: The developer area of the HUC-12 watershed (unit: ha)

maxStreamOrder.description: The maximum Strahler order of streams in the HUC-12 (unitless)

environmentalFlow.description: Streamflow required for maintaining habitat suitability (unit: mm)

huc12.description: The ID of the HUC-12 watershed that this dataset is associated with

description.description: A description of the ground water dataset

sourceData.description: A URI referring to the original source of the dataset

year.description: The year that the value of the dataset represents

value.description: The datum that the dataset represents

unit.description: The name of the Unit associated with this dataset
